```{r setup}
library(square2023)
```

In this tutorial, we will show off a basic functionality of the `square2023` package. 

Consider starting with a vector of numbers:

```{r} 
x <- 1:10 
```

The `square()` function can square each entry of `x` and return the result as a vector. 

```{r} 
square(x) 
```
